file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: 'Current Stock Price'
  version: '1.0.0'
  description: 'An API that returns the current price of an entered stock ticker'
  contact:
    name: sam
    email: samdcaek@gmail.com
paths:
  /stockPrice:
    get:
      summary: Returns the most recent stock price
      parameters:
        - name: ticker
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          description: Stock ticker for requested company
      responses:
        200:
          description: Sucessful return of stock price
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  properties: 
                    ticker:
                      type: string
                      example: GOOGL
                      
                    price:
                      type: number
                      example: 1001.11
